column1: '''Julaire "Julie" Andelin''' is a native of [[wikipedia:Salt Lake City|Salt Lake City
column3: and the current co-chair of [http://www.mountaincon.org/about.html Mountain-Con]
column4: an annual science fiction and fantasy fandom celebration in Utah. She contributed some entries to the ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment]]''.

column1: * [[2006]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment]]''
